My Career

IDfy

Implemented Gmail API to develop the email communication system of the company. Worked on address verification app named Addressify. Implemented and integrated MailCatcher to test sending email. Squash bugs and handled tickets raised by the ops team.

Web Developer

My Skills

My Projects

SolveSudoku

A Sudoku Solver using OpenCV. SolveSudoku extracts sudoku from an image and converts it into a 2D matrix. Then it's solution is calculated using Backtracking Algorithm.

   ...  

Handwritten Digit Classification

Implemented multilayer CNN using Keras on MNIST dataset. The Neural Network was trained on 60,000 images of 28x28 pixels.

   ...  

Group Chat Web App

Achieved real-time messaging by implemented WebSockets with Action Cable. Used Devise gem for authentication. Used Semantic UI framework for front-end development.

   ...  

Tachometer

Developed a device using Arduino UNO open-source Microcontroller board based on the Microchip ATmega328P which can calculate object’s revolving speed.

   ...  

Investry

A web app built using RoR in which users can track stock prices and follow particular stocks according to their choice.

   ...  

Image Watermarking

Implemented Image Watermarking using Discrete Cosine Transformation in MATLAB and Simulink.

   ...  

University App

A web app built using RoR in which users can view and join University courses.

   ...  

Todo Web App

A web app which can help you to track your daily tasks built using Ruby on Rails.

   ...  

Hand Gesture Recognition

Extracted and segmented hand region from live video by thresholding. Count the number of fingers from the segmented hand region by using Convex Hull.
